Package jrtr

Interface Summary
RenderContext Declares the functionality of a render context, or a "renderer".
RenderPanel An interface to display images that are rendered by a render context (a "renderer").
SceneManagerInterface An interface declaration for scene managers.
SceneManagerIterator An iterator to traverse scenes.
Shader Declares the functionality to manage shaders.
Texture Declares the functionality to manage textures.
 

Class Summary
Camera Stores the specification of a virtual camera.
Frustum Stores the specification of a viewing frustum, or a viewing volume.
GLRenderContext This class implements a RenderContext (a renderer) using OpenGL.
GLRenderPanel An implementation of the RenderPanel interface using OpenGL.
GLShader Manages OpenGL shaders.
GLTexture Manages OpenGL textures.
Light Stores the properties of a light source.
Material Stores the properties of a material.
RenderItem A data structure that contains a shape and its transformation.
Shape Represents a 3D shape.
SimpleSceneManager A simple scene manager that stores objects in a linked list.
SWJPanel Shows the bitmap rendered by the the software renderer.
SWRenderContext A skeleton for a software renderer.
SWRenderPanel Implements a panel for a software renderer.
SWShader Manages shaders for the software renderer.
SWTexture Manages textures for the software renderer.
VertexData Provides functionality to specify 3D geometry in the form of triangle meshes.
 

Enum Summary
VertexData.Semantic Vertex data semantic can be position, normal, or texture coordinates.
